[[File:Bag_Electric_Egg_Sprite.png|thumb|120px|Electric Egg]] An '''Electric Egg''' is a type of Pokémon [[Egg]] that can hatch Electric-type Pokémon. ==Details== ===Hatch Table=== {| class="wikitable" |- !
